name: Doodle Source
overview:
Doodle Source gathers all Google logos worldwide the second they are changed and keeps an archive. You can also sort them by country, title or date.

Strong pros of my website:

  • Faster than http://www.google.com/logos/
  • You can follow doodles very easily with out worldwide RSS, countr-specific RSS or Twitter,
  • Have more information about the actual Doodle rather than a search query that Google gives.

Right now we only have doodles starting 30th August 2009, the date we launched. We are going to add all older Doodles since 1999.
